name: Iwaku - Usergroup Colors 3.0
description:
Enables client-side customization of usergroup colors.

Hit the "customize" button to change the color settings. Click "Install Style" when finished. Note that you need the Stylus browser extension for this to work.
additional_info:
v3.1 (March 3, 2022)
- Add new selector .username--style83 (Community Lead)
- Change Administrator and Security Staff default colors for better legibility on Dusk theme.

v.3.2 (April 3, 2022)
- Add new selector .username--style84 (Roleplay Lead)

Credit:
Inspired by Wolk's Custom Usergroup Colors stylesheet.
